channel.title: Running a private server off webhost
channel.description:
Hi there,
I was wondering what would be needed to be able to run a server off a website, like the popular server frugooscape.net does, enabling me to have it running almost 24/7 and with less lag due to my high bandwith please let me know.
Thanx

item.title: Running a private server off webhost
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

thats not possibleâ€¦youre only possible to run a client from a web page[br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2007, 11:57:48 AM[/size][hr]well, it is possible, but i think you need to own the host server yourself to do that
